skills.beginner: Basic knowledge of RPC style communication between two systems
skills.intermediate: Know the different communication protocols for distributed systems (RPC and message passing) and the practical implication of distributed systems (failure, centralization, etc.)
skills.confirmed: Understand the practical implication of the CAP theorem
skills.expert: Has implemented or used consensus solving protocols (Paxos, etc.)

trends.description: CAP theorem and consensus algorithms, see the topics of the latest conf on distributed systems like RICON
